wikipedia_page.main: Ann Scott (born 1950) is a British feminist author born in London to an American father and British mother.

response: Ann Scott (born 3 November 1965 in Paris, France) is a French novelist. She is regarded as a social realist for her novels which paint portraits of contemporary youth and her second novel Superstars has given her a cult status in France.Le Monde, 20 August 2001

link_mentions.page: Women's Institute for Freedom of the Press
